name: MCQs Series By J.K
description: MCQs Series By J.K is an App that can be used in different Medical and Dental Exams. This App will cover Basic Medical Sciences Course and Clinical Subjects. It can be helpful in preparation of NBDE, ADC, Canadian Board Exams, MBBS Exams (1st, 2nd, 3rd & Final Year), BDS Exams (1st, 2nd, 3rd & Final Year), FCPS Part 1, FCPS Residency Test Exams, Intermediate Module of FCPS, MDS, MPhil, Public Service Commission Exams, In fact it can be used in any Dentistry or Medical Exam which will be MCQs Based.  This App does not only contain MCQs but it also covers Random Pearls/ Points of Basic and Clinical Subjects.  With passage of time we will add more MCQs and Random Pearls and will cover more Subjects on daily Basis (Almost).
